intro: The v-divider component is used to separate sections of lists or layouts.

inset.heading: Inset
inset.intro: Inset dividers are moved 72px to the right. This will cause them to line up with list items.

vertical.heading: Vertical
vertical.intro: Vertical dividers give you more tools for unique layouts.

portrait.heading: Portrait View
portrait.intro: Create custom cards to fit any use-case.

subheaders.heading: Subheaders
subheaders.intro: Dividers and subheaders can help break up content and can optionally line up with one another by using the same inset prop.
